transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: BC stone ka manager phone hai?

Customer: Sorry BC stone ka?

Customer: Han ji main hi hu bataye.

Executive: Aap hi ho? Mera naam Simran hai. Main mera naam Simran hai.

Customer: Simran

Executive: Simran

Customer: Hanji sir bataye.

Customer: Main keh raha tha ki aap dekhte ho na isko BC stone ka catalog ko khol ke isme kaise by lead aa rahi hai, kaise nahi aa rahi hai, kya hai, kya nahi hai?

Executive: Sir main actually aapko kafi time se main call bhi kar rahi thi yaha par regular basis pe. To main isi feedback ke regarding hi call kar rahi thi but aapke end se answers hi nahi ho rahe the call. Right? To mujhe bataye sir kya problem aa rahi hai abhi?

Customer: Isme humko by lead aati nahi hai consume karne layak kya kare fir batao. Panel ki stone slabs ke bas do hi aati hai iske alawa koi aati nahi hai.

Executive: Ah, ek second. Kaun kaun si categories mein aati hai?

Customer: Sandstone.

Customer: Sandstone slabs.

Customer: Sandstone panel bas iske alawa kuch aata hi nahi hai iske alawa.

Customer: Sandstone wall panel. Sandstone slab.

Customer: Bas ye hamare kaam ke nahi hai.

Executive: Baki aapko sandstone temple aur sandstone jaali ki nahi aati hai?

Customer: Ye nahi aati hai na.

Customer: To batao kya kare hum? Ab paisa lagaye IndiaMART pe tab kis base pe lagaye aap to bolenge ki ye le lo wo le lo falana kar lo dhikana kar lo. Ab kya kare hum paisa lagake batao?

Executive: Just a second sir. Aapko sabko rehta hai ki kaam se milta hai tabhi to paisa lagate hain.

Executive: Sandstone temple. Sandstone temple. Stone temple. Just a second sir mujhe check karne dijiye.

Executive: Sir aapko is mahine abhi tak sandstone temple ki kitni leads consume kari hai aapne? Idea hai aapko?

Customer: Hmm to pure mahine mein char aagi to kya char ho jati hai kya?

Executive: Sir aapne char consume kari hai yaha par 66 aayi hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: IndiaMART pe to post ho rahi hai 66 aayi hai sir. Sandstone temple mein. Aur 66 66? Hanji 66. Aur aapne char is mahine is mahine mein? Hanji sir isi isi mahine mein. Aaj ki date tak aagi? Hanji. Aaj ki date tak aagi aapka kehne ka matlab ye hai is mahine mein? Hanji sir isi mein is mahine mein 66 aagayi hai abhi tak. Aur aapne char consume kari hai. Main aapko batao 66 kaun kaun chahiye batao mere ko.

Executive: Sahi hai aap apne panel pe bhi check kar sakte hain baki. Dekhiye apne panel pe check kare.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Sandstone temple. Stone stone temple marble wala to nahi hai na?

Executive: Nahi sir sandstone outdoor temple. Ye 29 minutes pehle ki hi thi Gurugram Haryana se. Sandstone mere ko kyu nahi dikhati hai par mere mere phone mein kyu nahi aate mere ko kyu show nahi karti hai?

Executive: Sir aap aapne abhi abhi apna phone open kiya hai?

Executive: Matlab aapne abhi abhi leads vagera check kari hai apni?

Customer: Han kari hai na tabhi to maine phone lagaya tha.

Executive: Abhi abhi ye actually na aapko ye na subah ke time bhi jyadatar post hui hai kyuki abhi aadhe ghante pehle post ho rakhi hai ek ghante pehle ki bhi dikh rahi hai. Char ghante pehle ki bhi mujhe dikh rahi hai yaha par. 16 ghante pehle ki dikha raha hai 6 ghante pehle ki dikha raha hai. Char ghante ki dikha raha hai. Pehle char ghante aata hai fir 16 ghante aata hai aisa ulta pulta kyu aata hai isme?

Executive: Sir mere paas yaha par line se dikh raha hai. Aap waha par apna aap kis mein check kar rahe ho past leads check kar rahe hain aap?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Han ji.

Executive: Main puch rahi sir main ye puch rahi thi aap apna past leads mein check kar rahe hain?

Customer: By lead pe.

Executive: By lead pe kar rahe hain ek baar aap apna na usse check kariye past leads mein. Aap phone se chala rahe hain apna phone se chala rahe hain aap apna? Han. Thik hai jaha par aap by leads mein hai na waha par jaha pe relevant recent likha hai aap Sorry? Hello? Relevant likha hai? Han jaha pe recent relevant likha hai na aap usko scroll karo waha par aapko past lead dikhega.

Customer: Main pehle usi pe jata hu uske baad mein jaake chalta hu lekin usme wahi 16 ghanta dikha raha hai. 16 ghante pehle jab lead mere ko 16 ghante baad ki milegi to main kaise consume kar paunga?

Executive: Nahi sir but main yaha par check kar rahi hu to mujhe aapke yaha par abhi aadhe ghante pehle ki bhi dikh rahi hai. Aap fir se check kar lijiye.

Customer: Madam maine khol rakha hai. Hmm. Ek ghanta char ghanta fir 12 ghante fir 16 ghante fir 17 ghante fir 21 ghante. Hanji. Hanji to wahi dekhiye na ki sandstone mein leads to aa rahi hai. Sir aapko highly active rehna hoga tabhi aap isme leads vagera consume kar payenge please. Hai na? Aayegi to ho jayega lekin isme 4000 hue hum jab humko hamari koi cheez kaam ki nahi dikh rahi to fir isme matha patti kaise kare hum ye hai na hamara kehne ka matlab. Isme dikhai nahi deti hai aadhe ghante 15 minute do minute pehle ki to. Hanji sir wo isliye kyuki competition vagera bhi jyada hai thik hai. But kitna bhi competition ho humne services bhi achi le rakhi hai no doubt but sir hume fir bhi highly active rehna rahega. Taki hume leads jyada se jyada hum consume kar paye. Mera bas lekin paise jyada dekar bhi by lead bhi nahi aati uske bajay to 30000 wale package sahi rehta hai na? Nahi sir aisa nahi hai. Dekhiye aap aisa hi hai koi matlab nahi is saal paise dene se. Humse by leads ki baat kar rahe hain thik hai aapko samne se log bag jo directly approach kar rahe hain unka kaisa response hai? Jo aapko mail ke through approach kar rahe hain unka kaisa response hai?

Customer: Response vagera kuch nahi mil raha hai na. Hum to pareshan hai na to khud pareshan hoke tab call lagata hu. Main to pareshan nahi karta hu kisi ko. Paise de dete hain fir kaam nahi milta hai to thik nahi rehta hai.

Executive: Ji ji. Sir ye calls vagera aapko aa to rahe the thik hai jaise ki aapka ratio hamesha chalta aa raha hai jaise ki aapka particular rehta hai thik hai. Aapka yaha par July, August, September mein aath aath calls aa rahe the. Aapko last month se October se char char calls aaye hain thik hai last month bhi aapko char aaye the to do answer hue hain do nahi hue thik hai I guess aapne call back kar liya hoga unpe thik hai. And is mahine bhi abhi tak aapko char aa gaye hain aapne sare answers kare hain thik hai. To abhi aapke paas jitne bhi aaye aapko sare answers karne rahenge so that kya rahega ki aapka usi accordingly aap jitne jitne dekhiye aap answers karenge na utna hi aapka accordingly badhta jayega ratio calls ka hai na? Kyuki sari cheeze AI pe work karti hai right? And same goes with agar main aapka samne se approachable check karu thik hai ki aapko log bag directly inquiries se kaisa approach kiya hai. Aapko abhi tak 10 logo ne approach kiya hai samne se right? I guess aapki sabse baat ho gayi hai?

Customer: Pata nahi abhi ye to mere ko to kuch dhyan nahi hai.

Executive: Sahi hai ek baar please check kar lijiye lead manager mein jaake aapne. Han na? Thik hai. Baki main aisa karti hu ki main aapke sath na touch mein rehti hu thik hai. And main aapka by leads wala jo ye problem aa raha hai main ek baar ye dekh leti hu thik hai. Baki ek baar main aapka ka jo dusra category hai main usme bhi check leti hu kitni leads aa rahi hai. Sandstone jaali mein. Nahi ye dekho na abhi mere ko dikhai kyu nahi deti hai jaali ki mandir ki by leads mein aa hi nahi rahi. Kyu nahi aayi karan kya hai iska? Sir divert to nahi kar rakha hai kahin? Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hai. Dekhiye lead panel pe aa rahi hai thik hai. But hum logo ko thoda sa active aana hoga tabhi hume leads vagera jyada se jyada mil payenge. Mera bas ye kehna hai. Kyuki leads to post ho rahi hai. Hai na? Mere phone mein to kyu nahi ho rahi na main ye keh raha hu. Samajh gayi sir wo main aapko ki lead vagera aa rahi hai par aapko nahi dikh rahi hai. Main wahi keh rahi hu ki aap hum thoda sa active rahoge to aapko jarur dikhengi thik hai kyuki kya hota hai ki aap dekhiye aap bhi active rehte hain aap hi ki tarah aapke jitne bhi competitors hai wo bhi active rehte hain. Jaise hi lead aati hai kyuki ek lead ko sirf paanch hi log consume kar paate hain na. Is wo cheez hai jaise hi lead aayegi agar kisi bhi first five ne consume kar li to wo lead dispose ho jayegi fir. Hai na? Thik hai. Baki aapka sandstone jaali mein main aapko bata deti hu ye aapko abhi tak yaha par 18 lead post ho gayi hai yaha par. Thik hai. Thik hai. Hai na? Acha sir ye aapka concern jo open kara tha main ye close kar du? Han han close kar do. Thik hai sir aapko na ek feedback aayega thik hai. Mere liye feedback hoga wo. Thik hai. Okay. Okay sir main baki aapse na touch mein rehti hu and main aapko na whatsapp pe bhi text drop kar deti hu kuch bhi problem aaye mujhe waha pe directly approach kar lena thik hai. Han han kuch likh ke bhej do. Hanji main aap ek baar number batayenge apna whatsapp? 9829 98289 Nahi nahi 9829 Acha 9829 28 28 23 23 01 01 9829282301 right? Ji. Sir ek baar check kariye aapke paas whatsapp pe message aaya hoga. Hai na? Message aaya? Han. Thik hai aapko kuch bhi problem aaye ab aap mujhe directly approach kar sakte hain thik hai mera number aapke paas hai. Okay okay. Okay main aapka close kar rahi hu thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Wants leads for sandstone temple and jaali.

- Expresses frustration with spending money without results.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed 66 sandstone temple leads this month.

- Executive explained the importance of being active.

- Executive will check the buyleads issue.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.

- Executive will check the buyleads issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sandstone, temple, jaali, subscription
